Package org.quartz.ee.jta

Class Summary
JTAJobRunShell An extension of JobRunShell that begins an XA transaction before executing the Job, and commits (or rolls-back) the transaction after execution completes.
JTAJobRunShellFactory Responsible for creating the instances of JTAJobRunShell to be used within the QuartzScheduler instance.
UserTransactionHelper A helper for obtaining a handle to a UserTransaction...
